text: Hey team, looking to work with David Brown for Amart Furniture. Budget is approx $9,984 - need 1 x 90-second product demo, 2 x Twitter post, 3 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Instagram reel, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel. 4 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 11 months. Start date: September 2025. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
